context.title: Autokey-Vigenère
context.description:
The Autokey-Vigenère cipher works like the Vigenère cipher, but appends the plaintext to the keyword instead of just extending the keyword to plaintext length (as in Vigenère).
By incorporating the plaintext into the keyword, the ciphertext-only analysis is a lot harder than the analysis of the normal Vigenère algorithm.
